column5: Looking for the best Shimano TDR for #0 and #1 dipsy's in 8'6".  The specs are almost the same between the Medium and Medium Hvy so I'm leaning towards the Med.  It will be primarily used for walleye fishing. TIA.
I use the 1803 med hvy 8' with the #0 dipsy and it puts a pretty good bend in it.
I prefer heavier rods for dipseys. I find the dipseys trip better.
I preferred heavier and longer , 8 footers and a long leader make netting tense. Running wire get a twilli tip .
